mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PetDiagnosis (dno, name, birth, age, sex, surgery, weight, breed, diagnosis_condition, diagnosis_file, diagnosis_date, eye1, eye2, eye3, eye4, eye5, eyeColor, skin1, skin2, skin3, skin4, skin5) VALUES (#{dno}, #{name}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{surgery}, #{weight,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{breed}, #{condition}, #{file}, #{diagnosisdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eye1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eye2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eye3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eye4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eye5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eyeColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skin5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
